summary: October 2018 Jack-o-lantern scarecrow dance  If by chance you see them dance Don’t tell them in advance That you would like to...
body:
October 2018

Jack-o-lantern scarecrow dance

If by chance you see them dance

Don’t tell them in advance

That you would like to dance

Just join in and dance

Old man moon wishes he had a chance

 To try this dance.

But not everyone gets the chance

 To see them dance.

blog.name: lycantober
blog.title: Night of the Lycantober
blog.description:
Blog is now OPEN for October only.
This is a monthly blog dedicated to the werewoofers. Started this on DeviantArt as my own challenge.
I now will allow others to post werewolf-related pics on this blog. But before you do. Please read the rules.
NoTL Rule Guidelines
•	I will only accept Werewolves or Werewolf-esqe demons. 
•	Half Werewolves are ok such as Werepires. As long they have the power of the moon beast. 
•	No Werebeast, that includes Werehogs; I don’t honestly think Sonic is a werewolf since there is no lycanthropy connections. But they will deserve their own month/list. 
•	No demons that are already canines or other animals, they honestly don’t need to be werewolves.
•	I will only allow blood and gore.
•	No Fetish-related themes. I am not comfortable of making your fantasy on my page. 
•	NO sexual themes/NSFW related. It is FORBIDDEN my page >:(
•	No Religious themes. I’m not bashing on the topic as I am Catholic myself, I don’t encourage to upset others who are against…. well…monsters and demons.
•	No hate related topics.
•	No Political topics. This is a hate and drama-free event I do.
•	The Eclipse or Blood Moon Edition is only exclusive to certain characters of mine. If you have a character that should be part of BL, Note me why.
•	Failure to follow or read the rules, I have the right to refuse to draw your characters.
I also take part of Inktober as well, so if you’ll be seeing my ink works of werewolf related pic.
I can't promise that I will be doing this daily or getting all the characters. But fear not, if your characters didn't make it for the month, I’ll make a list for their appearance next October.
 Once October is done, I will not accept any post and request.
If you have any questions, just drop an Ask; And will answer your questions.
Let the beast unleash!

summary: Even a man who is pure in heart and says his prayers by night, may become a wolf when the wolfbane blooms and the autumn moon is...
caption:
Even a man who is pure in heart and says his prayers by night, may become a wolf when the wolfbane blooms and the autumn moon is bright.
                      ~quote from The Wolf Man 1941 and 2010

A shy and nervous boy who is gifted with magic. Leo lives with his guardian fairy Sara, who always take good care of Leo ever since he was a infant. Leo can be quite clumsy when it comes to creating magic,spells, or inventing. When a full moon rise, Leo will turn into a vicious Garoku (flying werewolf) and attack innocent people. When two young heroes Laszlo and Yugo encounter WereLeo, the monster was about to scratch Lazlo with his deadly claws, but Yugo pushed Lazlo out of the way and then he was scratched and turned into a Garoku as well.

Ah the Anibreds, how I had missed these guys. I remember making them since my senior year of 2008. I had thought of having either Leo or Yugo to partake in Lycantober. And Leo is the first to go.

More Night of the Lycantober

www.deviantart.com/chibi-tediz…  

Art and Leo © Franchesca Huerta aka Chibi-Tediz

Please do not use any of my characters or my work without my prior permission.If so, you will be warned. Reblogging is OK

blog.name: shivasart
blog.title: Shiva Shahmir
blog.description: A first generation american wanderer and observer born in the Garden State, raised in the valley of Golden State and matured in beautiful British Columbia.  Major in Fine Arts from the University of British Columbia. Multidisciplinary and Interdisciplinary arts practice: audio engineer and new media practictioner. Training in piano and ballet and martial arts. Writer.Winner of UBC Dean of Arts Prize for Best Essay in Visual Literacy 2015. Organizer, arts administrator, event coordinator, community radio advocate, HAM radio technician and DJ. Former studio at Red Gate Arts Society and now at home in Detroit. Current Executive Director of Spread Art Detroit.

summary: Colored the Uppercut animation. Added some type of flame effect to see what it would look like. The final is going to look a lot...
caption:
Colored the Uppercut animation. Added some type of flame effect to see what it would look like. The final is going to look a lot better then what I slapped on in 5 seconds.

I only need to add the highlights/shadows and it will be ready to go
